      • avgDistance

                 Tuple tp1,
                 java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> clusteredData,
                 java.lang.String typeDistance)
        Method that return the mean of the distances between the tp1 and the tuples obtainable by the data row with index clusteredData
        Parameters:
        data - List that contains all the examples
        tp1 - current tuple
        clusteredData - Set that contain the set of clustered items
        typeDistance - type of distance to calculate ("edit" or "euclidea")
        Returns:
        mean of the distances
